title: Amphenomenon
author: Amphenomenon
created_time: July 13, 2023, 01:51:51 AMLast edit: July 13, 2023, 10:07:23 AM by Amphenomenon
content: In Nigeria almost all the drainage has a blockage just from the fact that citizens has turned the drainage to dump yard and they suffer from it especially during this period of rain. The government are not trying the little that is done should be appreciated and cared for because when it gets bad again we still gonna suffer it. It's raining season and we can see the effects of this, when they are poured into drainage. How many times have you gone out during this raining season and have not seen a block drainage leading to road or other places filled with water. We mostly don't care till it affects us that like the biggest issue in Nigeria. Let's try to limit the use of rubber and plastic and even if we do use it, let's us try to dispose them properly.This causes soil and water pollution (since plastic is a non-biodegradable waste).Pet coke use the tag RECYCLE Me but most times it's still end in drainage Is not everything the government has to enact laws on before we know is badPray God help us to the right thing always

comments.body: OP, you have two same thread here on this same topic. Why don't you lock one and leave this one for the discussion that you created it for. In my state we lack drainage and it is really affecting during raining season and flood period. I don't know what by the government don't care about our drainage anymore to help reduce the flood in our environment anytime that it rains. Anyway sha,na we dey put dirty wey dey block the drainage and no be government dey do am. na e make for big cities, government cover all the drainage so that you no go fit put any dirty inside gutter. Naija na country wey be say everybody dey do as e like forgetting say your action fit affect the next person negatively.

comments.body: It's beneficial that the forum offers a platform for us, just like other countries with a thriving crypto scene. However, we should exercise caution when discussing negative aspects of our country in a language that can be easily understood by everyone. Every nation faces its own set of challenges, even though ours might appear particularly frustrating at times.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: This issue of people dumping refuse into drainages na something wey don become very common in our various towns, sub urban areas and cities, and there are several factors wey dey cause such scenario, such as when a town or city no get a particular place where everybody is expected to dey dump their refuses regularly by the regulatory bodies in charge and a penalty for whoever found guilty, wey go discourage people from dumping tins inside gutter whenever they see rain dey fall, because I bet you you not fit try this kind nonsense in some parts of P.H when governor Wike was in power, as task force go just carry you one hand and you see yourself paying money wey you no been expect, and that will be a lesson to many others.

And u way dey live for batcha house, e get as u go pimp and keep inside clean who no com in no go knw say u dey live Inside internal paradise.Naija people, abeg make we realize say good health na wealth and healthy life starts from inside before outside the life fit dey shine .Personal hygiene no be collective measure but individual so if we go fit care for ourselves the next person care for him self then we connect together we go see am say everywhere go stew on cleaning ness and hygienic for us all.Govt way no even send for us try do the least helpful projects for us abeg make we try manage dem in a useful manner.Make we take publicities of our areas as a collective measures by throwing our wastes for a proper waste been cuz no be everywhere ur hands face been waste been else if e bad na still we go suffer am.The rich dey always get means to scale through some things we dey cause for ourselves but the poor no get choice.
